Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-14017 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.11.1-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-14017 affecting package curl for versions less than 8.11.1-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package curl is earlier than 8.11.1-5, affected by CVE-2025-14017
